facades

Class CustomerFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • facades.CustomerFacade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClientFacade

    public class CustomerFacade
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClientFacade
    With the customer facade - the layer for the business logic - the customer can purchase coupon (and remove it) and get its coupons

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CustomerFacade()
      This CTOR instantiates the company & customer DaoDb layer, in order to allow access to its methods

      • login

        public boolean login(java.lang.String name,
                     java.lang.String password)
              throws CouponSystemException
        Login to the system by customer username & password
        Specified by:
        login in interface ClientFacade
        Parameters:
        name - username of customer
        password - password of customer
        Returns:
        true (if login succeeded) or false (if login failed)
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException

      • purchaseCoupon

        public void purchaseCoupon(Coupon coupon)
                    throws CouponSystemException
        A customer can purchase coupon after several validations: (1) Customer hasn't already bought this coupon. (2) There are coupons left (amount > 0). (3) The date of the coupon hasn't expired (end date is later than current time). After coupon is being purchased, the amount of the coupons is been decreased from the company balance
        Parameters:
        {{@link - Coupon}
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException
